title: Dialogue 2/6
author: The Transcriber
pages: Rune: One voice was all optimism, the other kind of doubtful.
Skye: Totally, like a mix of hope and doubt.
Rune: Almost like they were challenging our reality.
Skye: They touched on love and endless knowledge.
Rune: And how our choices define us.
Skye: A nod to the power weâ€™re holding onto.
